title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4243.20 - Generally
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4243.20 - Generally

State Regulations

The corporation may provide, within available
appropriations, loans, loan guarantees and grants, including, without limiting
the foregoing, interest subsidy grants, to eligible recipients for
infrastructure development financing projects. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4243.20

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
